info.female_impression: Is this all the information we have? Come on, Fairy, can't you do better?
info.male_impression: Hmm, I hope Soldier 11 remembers our name someday...
info.profile_desc:
Soldier 11 is a member of the New Eridu Defense Force.
She currently serves as a primary responder in the Obol squad, Obsidian Division. Soldier 11 is a code name — her real name remains unknown.
"...My name? I gave it up long ago.
It's only a reminder of my past, and the past makes you weak."

Soldier 11 is a fan of spicy food, and likes the super-spicy noodles served at Waterfall Soup.
It's worth noting she currently calls us by a different name every time she greets us.
Additional information regarding Soldier 11 is still being obtained.
unlock_conditions: Complete Agent Story "Mole in the Hole"

mindscape_cinemas.name: Rapid Heat
mindscape_cinemas.description: When Soldier 11 enters combat or switches in, if her Energy is less than 40, her Energy is recovered to 80. This effect can trigger once every 50s.
mindscape_cinemas.description2:
Long-term high-intensity combat training allows Soldier 11 to complete mastery of her regulatory systems.
She will always strive to ensure that she's in the best shape for each and every battle.

mindscape_cinemas.name: Scorching Convergence
mindscape_cinemas.description: When triggering Fire Suppression, Basic Attack, Dash Attack, and Dodge Counter DMG increases by 3%, up to 12 stacks, lasting 15s, with the duration of each stack calculated separately.
mindscape_cinemas.description2:
"She may look cold and hard, like a big ice cube... But actually, she's scalding hot inside, like a blazing fire."
— From an anonymous soldier of the Obsidian Division

mindscape_cinemas.name: Elite Soldier
mindscape_cinemas.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Assist, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2
mindscape_cinemas.description2: Soldier 11 always expects the most from herself, no matter if it's in training or physical combat. That is how she maintains her combat prowess.

mindscape_cinemas.name: Indulgent Blaze
mindscape_cinemas.description:
If Fire Suppression is triggered during the 1st, 2nd, or 3rd hit of Soldier 11's Basic Attack or a Dash Attack, Anti-Interrupt Level increases and DMG received is reduced by 18% during skill activation.
If Fire Suppression is triggered during the 4th hit of her Basic Attack, she becomes invulnerable during skill activation.
mindscape_cinemas.description2: She envies fire. And these smoldering flames will always help her.

mindscape_cinemas.name: Perfect Soldier
mindscape_cinemas.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Assist, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2
mindscape_cinemas.description2: The road from elite to exemplar is long and difficult, but Soldier 11 grits her teeth and perseveres, as if there's something pushing her towards the goal of becoming a perfect soldier...

mindscape_cinemas.name: Scorching Flow
mindscape_cinemas.description:
When Soldier 11 uses her EX Special Attack, Chain Attack, or Ultimate, she gains 8 stacks of Charge (max 8 stacks).
When Fire Suppression is triggered, 1 stack of Charge is consumed, causing the current move to ignore 25% of the target's Fire RES.
mindscape_cinemas.description2: The flames of the sword distorted the air with their heat. Her movements grew ever more impassioned, as if that heat seeped into her spirit with every breath, igniting her thoughts.

descriptions.name: Basic Attack: Warmup Sparks
descriptions.description:
Press  to activate:
Unleashes up to 4 slashes, dealing Physical DMG.

descriptions.name: Basic Attack: Fire Suppression
descriptions.description:
Press  at the right moment to activate:
Unleashes a set of more powerful slashes, dealing Fire DMG.

descriptions.name: Dodge: Tempered Fire
descriptions.description:
Press  to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions.name: Dash Attack: Blazing Fire
descriptions.description:
Press  during a dodge to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing Physical DMG.

descriptions.name: Dash Attack: Fire Suppression
descriptions.description:
Press  during a dodge to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing Fire DMG.

descriptions.name: Dodge Counter: Backdraft
descriptions.description:
Press  during a Perfect Dodge to activate:
Executes a powerful slash against enemies in front, dealing massive Fire DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions.name: Special Attack: Raging Fire
descriptions.description:
Press  to activate:
Slashes enemies nearby, dealing Fire DMG.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

descriptions.name: EX Special Attack: Fervent Fire
descriptions.description:
With enough Energy, press  to activate:
Slashes enemies nearby, dealing massive Fire DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, Soldier 11's Basic Attacks and Dash Attacks will trigger Fire Suppression for up to 15s or 8 times.

descriptions.name: Chain Attack: Uplifting Flame
descriptions.description:
When a Chain Attack is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful upward slash at enemies in a small area, dealing massive Fire DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, Soldier 11's Basic Attacks and Dash Attacks trigger Fire Suppression for the next 15s, up to 8 times.

descriptions.name: Ultimate: Bellowing Flame
descriptions.description:
When Decibel Rating is at Maximum, press  to activate:
Unleashes a powerful upward slash at enemies in a small area, dealing massive Fire DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, Soldier 11's Basic Attacks and Dash Attacks trigger Fire Suppression for the next 15s, up to 8 times.

descriptions.name: Quick Assist: Covering Fire
descriptions.description:
When the active character is launched, press  to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing Fire DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions.name: Defensive Assist: Hold the Line
descriptions.description:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press  to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions.name: Assist Follow-Up: Reignition
descriptions.description:
Press  after a Defensive Assist to activate:
Charge and cross slash enemies in front, dealing Fire DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions: When triggering Fire Suppression during a Basic Attack or Dash Attack, increase that attack's DMG by 35%.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
Soldier 11 deals 10% more Fire DMG. When attacking Stunned enemies, this effect is further enhanced by an additional 22.5%.
